General.Name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, agricultural, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: Lake Rajada Office Complex, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110
